Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near 87th
ShortDescription: Red Line Line trains are standing near 87th due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line Line trains are standing near 87th due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Shuttles buses have been requested from 95th to 63rd to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
